product_name: Komperdell BC Adventure Ski Poles - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Komperdell BC Adventure ski poles are built for backcountry explorations. Aluminum shafts are strong, lightweight and corrosion resistant. Adjustable biathlon webbing straps alleviate stress on wrists and hands. Includes powder baskets and steel tips. Closeout.
short_description: The Komperdell BC Adventure ski poles are built for backcountry explorations.
